description:
My place is close to Times Square, Columbus Circle, Totto Ramen, Pure Thai Cookhouse. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

This is a one bed room in a big apartment located in Midtown Manhattan. closed to Times Square and Central Park, 5 Avenue.
The room is bright with awesome view to Hell's Kitchen and the Hudson River.
name: Room Midtown with nice view for two
